messages.content: I need a compact comparison table for two support playbooks. Use Track A and Approach B. Keep the tone serious but concise.

Here is a quick comparison:

| Factor | Track A | Approach B | Approach C | Variant D | Path E | Style F |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Rework risk | start small | start small | start small | harder to scale | clear | clear |
| Quality control | harder to scale | clear | start small | start small | harder to scale | clear |
| Team fit | start small | start small | start small | harder to scale | clear | start small |
| Long-tail handling | start small | harder to scale | start small | harder to scale | clear | harder to scale |
